name: BOX X ! Fit It Hexa Word Puzzle Game
name_original: BOX X ! Fit It Hexa Word Puzzle Game
description:
BOXX amazing simple puzzle game. Simple rules unlimited fun for all ages.

Brain trainer, challenge your friends unlock achievements, and share on social media
simple rule just drag and drop blocks to create lines to remove the black from game play vertically and horizontally, try to keep the blocks from filing the screen.

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the frame
• Blocks can't be rotated.
• Don't worry! No time limits!

NEW GAME MODES
• Classic Game Mode
• Hexa Game Mode
• Unlock Bomb Mode
• New Blocks Mode

FEATURES
• BOXX PUZZLE
- Smoth effect for block puzzle game!
- Play easily and quickly.
- 4 Leaderboards
- 5 Achievements
- Daily rewards earn coins by spinning wheel
- Share your score on all social media and earn coins
- Undo button
- Switch Day/Night Mode
- No wifi needed
- Support all devices

NOTES
• BOXX! contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• BOXX! is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE and Undo.
